title: The Sneaker Database API. Your Ultimate Sneaker Encyclopedia
tool_name: The Sneaker Database API. Your Ultimate Sneaker Encyclopedia

api_list.name: Get a product by ID
api_list.description:
Get a product by it's UUID.
Only one product with it's size variant will be returned.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-sneaker-database-api-your-ultimate-sneaker-encyclopedia.p.rapidapi.com/product/01c1af38-d1d0-462c-aca3-13349dc893a9"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-sneaker-database-api-your-ultimate-sneaker-encyclopedia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-sneaker-database-api-your-ultimate-sneaker-encyclopedia.p.rapidapi.com/product/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-sneaker-database-api-your-ultimate-sneaker-encyclopedia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
